titleStmt.title: The knowledge of medals, or, Instructions for those who apply themselves to the study of medals both ancient and modern from the French.
Science des médailles. English
titleStmt.author: Jobert, Louis, 1637-1719.
Gale, Roger, 1672-1744.

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Roger Gale, of Jobert's La science des medailles.
Attributed to Louis Jobert. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
